summary: This document is a brief email correspondence from July 23, 2019, reporting that inmate Jeffrey Epstein, while on suicide watch, complained of a swollen throat. It is a routine medical update from prison staff.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Identified as inmate #76318-054 who is on suicide watch and reported having a swollen throat.

events.title: Epstein reports swollen throat
events.description: An inmate companion called to report that inmate Jeffrey Epstein said his throat was swollen while he was on suicide watch.

keyFacts: The document is dated July 23, 2019, which is approximately two weeks before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
Jeffrey Epstein was on suicide watch at the time of this report.
Epstein reported a medical complaint (swollen throat) while in custody.
